Text: Bank of Montrealpst Louise I spoke to our contact at BMO and they confirmed the MM is due to us by the end of day Wed Also mentioned they were awaiting to have offsetting discussions with John Arnold Let me know if I need to put another call into them Wed Kelly

Bank meetings in New York Cc Ken I am responsible for managing Enrons banking relationships and have been speaking to Rosalee about reserving time on your calendar for meetings with our top banks Given the uncertainty and tightness in the credit markets Andy Ben and I have discussed the importance of getting you and Andy in front the senior members of management at JPMorgan Chase Citigroup CSFB and Deutsche Bank We are expecting all of these institutions to play an important role in achieving our yearend financing plan Rosalee has indicated that you may have time available on Tuesday November th to meet in New York Please let me know if you can make your calendar available for these meetings Thank you Kelly

Rescheduled Enron Bank Meeting Cc Tuesday November Enron will be hosting our previously scheduled bank meeting on Monday November th at pm EST The meeting will take place at the Waldorf Astoria Hotel in midtown Manhattan As previously stated this meeting will be for Enrons bank relationship and credit officers only As such identification will be checked at the door If you have not already returned your institutions Confidentiality Agreement please fax it back to Mary Borders attention at by noon Friday November th Please note that there will not be a callin number or videoconference for this meeting Please reconfirm your attendance with Mary either by email or by phone as soon as possible We will be covering information on the pending merger our current financial situation and more details on our structured financings I realize that all of you have requested more information than we have been able to provide over the last few weeks Thanks for your patience and I look forward to seeing you Monday Regards Kelly Boots
Re Final presentation RAC FAQs Cc Tony pls rpint and send copies up to asap Thanks Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

RE Revision pm Cc Thanks Sharon and Rick I have one request and one question One point that came out from our dry run meeting this afternoon with a handful of our top bankers indicated that we need to be very clear on what RACs responsibilities are The slide looks like Market risk management followed by brief description of what this means Credit risk management ditto Underwriting ditto Portfolio ditto Rick this will feed into the What went wrong slide My question is related to the Cash Colloateral pg Is Net Cash in the legend supposed to be Net Cash Margin I will be in office Sat and probably Sun We need to have the complete presentation ready to send to New York for book preparation by Sunday at noon Please call me at work if you have any questions Thanks for the help Kelly Original Message From Sullo Sharon E Sent Friday November PM To Boots Kelly H Wolfe Tony Cc Buy Rick Subject Revision pm Importance High Another update to slide Thanks Sharon File RAC FAQsDPppt

Re CSFB Prepay Cc In the european csfb prepay which was just extended morgan stanley was also involved for a related swap of the same amount I think csfb was aware of that on the euro prepay Has it been mentioned yet Treasa knows the details I wonder if RBS is another institution which could move quickly They have capacity now Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet
